text: Ndikusintha kothamanga kuchokera pa kota mayilosi mpaka theka la mayilo, liwiro silimakhala lofunikira kwambiri koma kupilira ndiko kumafunika kwenikweni.
Onanai maulendo amene mkhalapakati akulimbikitsa, kaya pa tsamba la intaneti kapena pawindo la shopu.
Chiwelengero cha anthu m'mzinda wa Vatican ndi pafupifupi 800. Ndi dziko laling'ono lodziyilira palokha komanso dziko la anthu ochepa kwambiri.
Kafukufuku wa Hershey ndi Chase adali m'modzi mwa maganizo otsogolera kuti DNA idali chibadwa.
Dziko la Cook ndi la zilumba limene limagwirizana mopanda kukamizidwa ndi dziko la New Zealand, lomwe lili ku Polynesia, pakati pa Nyanja yamchere ya Pacific.
Ngati mukufuna kudziwa kuponya Chida chomwe chimabweleranso, muyenera kuwonetsetsa kuti muli ndi chinanso chobwelera.
Skiing wotsetsereka kutsika pansi pa phiri ndi masewero omwe adayambikira muzaka zamazana 17, ndipo muchaka cha 1861 kalabu linayambitsidwa ndi anthu aku Norway ku Australia.
Ndi amodzi mwa malo okopa alendo akulu ku South Africa ndipo amaganiziridwa kuti ndi malo ofunikira kwambiri ku South Africa National Parks (SANParks).
Nthawi zambiri nyimbozi zimajambulidwa pogwiritsa ntchito makompuyuta amakono kwambiri kuti anthe kuphatikiza mawu pamodzi.
Mwachitsanzo, wina atha kufotokoza kuti kupezeka kwama galimoto kumapangitsa kuti kukhale chitukuko cha misewu.
Galimoto ya zinyalala yimatseka malowedwe atsewu ndipo apolisi 80 ndiwomwe anathandizira anthu komwe nseu udalunjika.
A Dr Tony Moll adapeza Chifuwa chosanva mankhwala cha TB (XDR -TB) Kwazulu Natal ku South Africa.
Mkulu wankhondo a James Ewing amatenga asilikali 700 kudutsa nawo pa mtsinje ku Trenton Ferry, kulanda mlatho umene umapita ku Assunpink Creek ndikulepheretsa asilikali agulu la adani kuti asathawe.
Safari ndi mawu amene amatchulidwa kawirikawiri ndipo amatanthauza ulendo wapamtunda okawona nyama zokongola zakutchire za ku Afirika kawirikawiri ku Savanna.
MetroRail ili ndi magawo awiri mu masitima anjanje omwe amakwera oyenda ndikuzungulira mu Cape Town: MetroPlus (imene imatchedwanso Kalasi Yoyamba) ndi Metro (yotchedwa Kalasi Yachitatu).
Cell lidachokera ku mawu achilatini otchedwa cella omwe amatanthauza kuti kachipinda kakang'ono.
Nervous System imatumiza mauthenga a misempha kuthupi lonse kuti magazi aziyendabe mosasokonezedwa.
Alloys kwambiri amapangidwa posakaniza zitsulo ziwiri kapena zingapo.Tisayiware kuti pali zinthu zambiri pa tebulo la periodic.
Seweroli poyambilira linagwiritsa anthu ongoyeselera kupanga masewero amau, ochokela mbali yakum'mawa kwa Texas.
Mukuyakhulapo adati “matenda atsopanowa, ndiwovuta mosowetsa mtendere chifukwa cha momwe anthu akufera”.
Mwa anthu 100,34 aliwonse akugwilizana nazo, amafuna Mfumukazi Elizabeth Wachiwiri waku Australia kukhala wolamula wotsiliza.
Kuyenda masana kumakhala kwa ulendo wochepa wosakwana mayilosi mpaka mitunda italiitali yomwe itha kuyendedwa pa tsiku limodzi.

Masewero otsetsereka m'madzi owuma, kuphatikizapo a skii ndi okwera snowboard, ndimasewera wotchuka omwe amakhala omatsetsereka m'misewu yomwe ili madzi owuma ofewa pogwiritsa ntchito ma skii kapena snowboard zomangidwa kumapazi ako.
Kutengera pa zomwe zapezeka zakalezi, zikutanthauza kuti kulekanitsaku kwafulumira kusiyana ndi m'mene zikuyembekezeredwa ndi umboni wa molecule.
Ngati mukupita ku Greenland nthawi yozizira (poganizira kuti pamene ukupita kumpoto kwambiri mpamene kumazizira kwambiri), ndikoyenera kutenga zovala zotenthera zokwanira.
Njira yosavuta kuyamba bizinezi yolemba za maulendo ndi kuphunzila izi patsamba lokhazikika la maulendo.
Zoona zake, ma code amchigawo alibe zovuta pakukopera mosaloledwa; kukopa kwazonse mu disk ikasewera bwinobwino pachida chilichonse pamene disk yeniyeniyo itha kusewera.
Matendawa akumatengedwa ndi nkhumba zimene zikumapatsira anthu podzera ku udzudzu.
Zidawoneka ngati zipinda. Adali munthu woyamba kuwona ma cello wokufa.

Mzinda wa Beijin ku China ndiwomwe masewera adzachitikire amu nyengo yozizira a Olympic Winter Games mu 2022, zomwe zizapangitse kuti ukhale mzinda woyamba kuchitika masewerowa kawiri amunyengo yotentha komaso yozizira.
Mlatho wa Mtsinje wa Oyapock ndiwo mlatho wa chingwe. Umadzera Mtsinje wa Oyapock kukalumiza mzinda wa Oiapoque ku Brazil komanso mzinda wa Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock ku French Guiana.
Anthu ambiri amasungitsa malo awo lisanafike tsiku la ulendo (pachifukwa chakuti maboti amakhala odzaza nthawi yokondedwa yayitali).
Malo okhala gulu amasunga achinyamata - alendo ambili amakhala ndi zaka zam'ma kumi awiri- koma mutha kupeza akuluakulunso kumeneku nthawi zina.
Zikondwelero zapachaka zamakachisi ambiri zimayamba kumapeto kwa Novembala mpaka pakati pa Meyi, ndipo zimasiyanasiyana malingana ndi kalendala yapachaka ya kachisi.
Akatswiri ena asayansi akuganiza kuti ma Triceratop adadya ma cycad, amene ndi mtundu wachomera chimene chimapezeka kwambiri munthawi yama Cretaceous.
Pamene nthawi idali 11:20, apolisi adafunsa anthu kuti abwerele ku njira, kunena kuti akuyenera ku linganiza ufulu wawo wotsutsa ndi kuyamba kwa unyinji wa magalimoto.
Zochitika zina zokhuza masewero a skii, zikachitikira ku malo a Taizicheng ski amene ali mu mzinda wa Zhangjiakou, pafupifupi makilomita 220 (mamayilosi 140) kuchokera ku Beijing.
Aliyense amene akupita kudziko lomwe litha kuganiziridwa kuti ndikwa nkhondo ayenera kuphunzira mwa ukadaulo zokhuza nkhondo.

Chombo cha Chandrayaan-1 chomwe chidalibe woyendetsa popita kumwezi chidatulutsa Moon Impact Probe (MIP), chidadutsa pamwamba pa mwezi mothamanga kwambiri paliwiro lokwana makilomita 1.5 pa second (mamayilosi 3000 pa ola limodzi), ndipo idayima mogunda pansi bwinobwino pafupi ndi chakumwera kwa mwezi.
Komanso, mu nyengo yotentha tizilombo ta bakiteriya timakula msanga ndi kupulumuka kwa nthawi yayitali kunja kwa thupi.
Akadaulo oyenda m'mwamba pena amayenda pamtunda, basi kulizungulira phiri kapena kufika kunsonga kwenikweni kwa dziko koma ndikotakasuka.
Ndere zimatulutsa poyizoni otchedwa neurotoxin amene amatha kuononga mitsepha ya anthu ndi nsomba.

Maufumu atatu amenewa, ndi amodzi awomwe adakhetsa mwazi mu mbiri yakale ya dziko la China pomwe anthu zikwizikwi adataya miyoyo pomenya nkhondo kuti akakhale pa mpando waukulu ku nyumba ya chifumu imene inali ku Xi'an.
Mukangwiritsa ntchito shipboard excursions kupita ku mtunda simusowekela visa ya padela (kuyambira 2009).
Popezanso zina zomwe zilipo zimathandiza kudziwa kusitha kwa nthenga mu mbalame.
Odwala ena ayenera kuti adatenga kachilomboka ali kuchipatala, Dr. Moll, akuganiza kuti awiri adali wogwira ntchito kuchipatala.
Pamene munapita kunja kwanthawi yoyamba, anthu mkutheka anali oleza mtima ndi ovetsetsa, pozindikira kuti anthu apaulendo m'dziko latsopano ayenera kuzolowera.
Chipikisheni pa misewu chakhala chokakamiza malingana ndi nyengo ya 11 Seputembala, 2001 yapitayi.
Anthu tsopano amalemba mauthenga pa makina akompuyuta, sagwiritsanso ntchito chosongolera.
Kafukufuku akusonyeza kuti, ngakhale nchira wa Dinosaur yaying'ono, koma izi zikuoneka kuti ndi nthenga zawamkulu osati zankhuku.
Mulingo wa ph umawonetsedwa ndi kuchulukidwe ka ma Hydrogen (H mu ph) ayoni mumankhwala ake oyesedwawo.
Tsoka ilo ukamapanga DVD, m'malire ake muzadulidwaso, ndipo ngati kanema anali ndi mau ena kufupi ndikupansi, mauwonso samaoneka.
kunalibe kuchedwa modetsa nkhawa kunaperekedwa ku beltway, nseu wina wa nzindawu.
Tikati amphaka alipo ena okula mosiyanasiyana apakatikati omwenso amadya zinthu zapakatikati, monga kalulu gwape, ndi deer.
Mtundu wa chimfine cha mbalame omwe umapha anthu, wa H5N1, zatsimikizidwa kuti udagwira bakha wakutchire yemwe adapezeka atafa Lolemba, ku dambo lapafupi ndi Lyon chakum'mawa kwa France.

Ma Crosstie anayambitsidwa mwamsanga kwambiri kuthandizira kugwira moyendamo kukhala m'malo mwake. Pang'onopang'ono, komabe, zinadziwika kuti moyendamo mukanakhala mosavuta pakanakhala chitsulo pamwamba.
Chidziwitso chakuti pakuyikidwa mankhwala woipa, ndiko kupezeka kwa kontena yotseguka yamankhwala kapena mankhwala ena wowopsa opezeka mnyumba.
Izi zimapeleka mwayi wabwino owona Aurora borealis, pamene kumwamba kudzakhala m'dima wochuluka kapena wochepa usana ndi usiku.
Kukula kwamalo a dziko la Turkey likuipanga kukhala dziko lanambala 37 padziko lonse lapansi, ndipo ndilalikulu ngati mayiko awiri a Metropolitan France ndi United Kingdom kuwaphatikiza pamodzi.

Sipika wakale wa Nyumba yamalamulo a Newt Gingrich, bwanamkubwa wa Texas a Rick Perry, ndi mzimayi wa Congress a Michele Bachmann adamalizira m'malo achinayi, achisanu, ndi chisanu mchimodzi, motsatana.
Magulu azilumbazi amapezeka pa mtunda wamakilomita 120 kumpoto kwa Chisumbuchi. Chilumba chachikulu ndi King George ndi manyumba apamwamba a Villa Las Estrellas.
Purezidenti wa dziko la U.S. a George W. Bush adalandira mwansalangala zolengezazi.
Pali kuthekera kosiyana ndithu kosatha, koma izi ndi zokhazikika zomwe anthu ambiri amatanthauza akamanena zokhudza “kupita ku Disney World”.

Dziko la Italy zolinga zake zinali mayiko aku Africa. Kuti alande mayikowo, amafunika kukhala ndi malo okhazikika a asilikali, kuti asilikali azitha kuwoloka nyanja ya mediterranean ndi kulowa mu Africa.
Womwe adasankhidwa apamwamba mumpikisanowu dziko la South Africa lidayamba bwino pamene adapambana 26-00 kugonjetsa timu idasankhidwa panambala 5 ya Zambia.
Pamene adali m'galeta, adabwerera ku Paris atazunguliridwa ndi khamu la anthu lomwe limakuwa mwamphamvu ndiponso kulalata kuwopseza Mfumu komanso Mfumukazi.
Amir Khan yemwe adalandira mendulo ya siliva mu chaka cha 2004 adati, “Kuchokera pansi pa mtima wanga ndikuganiza kuti azimayi asamamenyane. Amenewo ndi maganizo anga.”
Ku Beijin ndikomwe kukachitikire mwambo wa zotsegulira ndi zotsekera zamasewera komaso masewero anyumba apadzi owuma.
Maganizowa akutsutsana ndi zimene zimanenedwa zoti mwezi sukhaliratu ndizochitika zachilengedwe.
Pali mawonekedwe amaso osiyanasiyana, maonekedwe osiyana potengera ndi zofunikira za thupi.
Schengen ndi mbali yomwe imakhala ngati dziko palokha pa nkhani zoterezi.
M'zaka za 1960, Brzezinski anagwira ntchito kwa John F. Kennedy ngati mulangizi wake kenako nthawi ya Lyndon B. Johnson.
Mu chaka cha 1957 dziko la Luxembourg lidakhala membala woyambitsa nawo bungwe lomwe lero likutchedwa European Union.
Nkhani yomwe ili mu opera yaku France yomwe adalemba ndi a Camille Saint-Saens, ndiyokhuza waluso wina “amene moyo wake umalamulidwa pokonda mankhwala osokoneza bongo komaso Japan.”
Pachiyambi chifukwa chobwelera m'mbuyo paza nkhondo, Ethelred adavomera zomwe amafuna a Olaf, yemwe adabwelera ku Norway kukayesa kutenga ufumu wake zimene zinatheka koma movutirapo.
Kenako adasamusidwa kupita ku Chipatala cha Addenbrooke ku Cambridge.
Nthawi ya alendo yopita ku kokwelera sitima zapamtunda kumapiri imafika pachimake nthawi yotentha yaku India.
Zinaso ndi chilumba cha Livingston ndi Deception pamene pali chidzenje cha volcano yosapola imene imaonesa doko lokongola la chilengedwe.

Mumpikisano wake wina, Giant Slalom, adamalizira nambala 10 mugawo lampikisano woyima wa azimayi munthawi yophatikiza yokwana 4:41:30; mphindi 2:11:60 kusiyana ndiwopambana woyamba waku Austria a Claudia Loesch komaso mphindi 1:09:02 kusiyana ndiamene adakhala nambala 9 a Gyöngyi Dani aku Hungary.
Murray adalephera gawo loyamba pamene wonse adafanana komanso ma serve wonse achigawochi.
Chionetselo cha Piramidi ndi Kuwala ndi chimodzi mwa zinthu zochititsa chidwi kwa ana.
Ngakhale chipikisheni cha anthu olowa nthawi zambiri sichichitika kapena zoyenera kuchitika mukafika kwanu, kulongosora miyambo kumatha kukhala kovuta.
Pamene uli pa tchuthi mdziko mwako mom'mo, umakhala ndi nthawi yambiri yosangalala komaso umakhalaso ndi nthawi yoti nkufulula kenakake kapaderadera.
Ma atom ena amakhala ndi nuclei yosakhazikika zonmwe zikusonyeza kuti zimangoswekwa opanda mphamvu.
Kumathero kwa tsiku Sabata, Pulezidenti waku United States a Donald Trump, kudzera kwa ofalitsa nkhani, adalengeza kuti asilikali aku US azichokako ku Syria.
Setilayiti yomwe ili mumlengalenga imalandira foni ndikuibwezela pansi, nthawi yomweyo.
Wina wotchuka ku Greece adali wamasamu Pythagoras, amene adadziwika ndi njira yake yofotokoza ubale wa mbali zofanana za triangle.
Anthu ena adaganiza kuti amalondola koma anthu ambiri adakhulupira zosiyana; kuti Mphamvu ya Dzuwa limazungulira Dziko, kuphatikizapo Dzuwa (komanso ngakhale nyenyezi).

Makasino amayesetsa kuchita zambiri zothekera kuti agwiritse ntchitobwino nthawi ndi ndalama zomwe alendo agwiritsa ntchito. Mawindo ndi mawotchi nthawi zambiri samakhalapo, ndipo kutuluka kumakhala kovuta.
Mzilumba ndi mnyanja simusowa maboti amtengo wapatali.
Makamaka mchilimwe musamale kwambiri udzudzu ngati mwaganiza zokayenda mu nkhalango.
Kanemayo, woseweledwa ndi a Ryan Gosling andi a Emma Stone anasankhidwa kuti alandile mphoto m'magawo onse.
Ndikofunikila theka la ola kuuyendela mudzi wopatsa chidwiwo.

Nyenyezi zimapereka kuwala komanso kutentha kamba ka mphamvu yomwe yimapangidwa pamene ma atom a mpweya wa hydrogen akaphatikizana (mwinaso kusakanikirana) limodzi kuti zithe kupanga zinthu zolemera zedi.
Mu 1995 adamuvotera wosewera wabwino mu mbiri ya Partizan.
Kusokoneza tulo ndiko kudzuka ndicholinga nthawi yanu yomwe munagonera kenako mkugonaso patapita kanthawi kochepa (mphindi 10-60).
Pano makompuyuta akugwiritsidwa ntchito yokonzera zithunzi komaso makanema.
Ku Rogaland ndi Agder amatchedwa kuti “hei” kutanthauza kuti moorland wopanda mtengo nthawi zambiri imakhala yokutilidwa mochititsa kaso.
Pofika pachimake pachisankho, 29% ya omwe adafunsidwa amakhulupirira kuti Australia iyenera kukhala republic posachedwa, pomwe 31% amakhulupirira Australia sayenera kukhala republic.
